methods.name: getEdge
methods.comment:
Overridden to handle edge picking with our custom edge placement.  The painting and picking
 algorithms in Jung are all hard-coded to transform loop edges to above the vertex--there
 is no way to plug our own transformation into Jung :(

params.name: viewSpaceX
params.comment: The x under which to look for an edge (view coordinates)

params.name: viewSpaceY
params.comment: The y under which to look for an edge (view coordinates)

return.comment: The closest edge to the given point; null if no edge near the point
